name: cars-db-cli
description: A CLI for a car database holding info on car brands, models, year of manufacturing, price and more

scripts.add-car: ts-node index.ts add -e user@example.com -p P4ssword! --brand Citroen --model C4 --year 2020 --price 2600000
scripts.find-cars: ts-node index.ts find -e user@example.com -p P4ssword! --brand Nissan -s price -d DESC
scripts.update-car: ts-node index.ts update -e user@example.com -p P4ssword! --id 65adb11a62a59cd5a788934d --brand Fiat --model 500 --year 2019 --price 2800000

author: Georgy Mishurovsky
